reviews.text:
I happened to pass by the little cafe in Jalan Besar and went in to have a scoop of ice cream  last Saturday 12 Apr.

I ordered the lychee raspberry and it was pretty good I must say.

The service was great as the person at the counter did inform me that the ice cream stock had just arrived and all ice cream were soft, which Is how I like it usually. I was promptly served a scoop for $5.50.

Had a wonderful time here during the school holidays! üé®üç∞ It was so nice to chill and enjoy some quality family time. The cake painting activity was super fun, and while we painted, we also ordered some food‚Äîeverything was absolutely delicious! üòã They even have adorable Labubu mini cakes! üßÅüíï Definitely worth a visit! üòä‚ú®

Called in to ask about the cakes and a guy answered. 15 minutes later, we got to the shop and was being well-served. Got the Chocolate Pistachio Kunafa cake for $59. Great buy, great service! Thank you to the gentleman at the counter who was v eloquent!

Visited Butter Studio for their cake painting experience and had such a fun and unique time with my family! üé®üç∞ Love that the activity includes all materials and a drink, and the space is so welcoming‚Äîperfect for families or friends to bond. The cakes were not only fun to decorate but tasted amazing too. I didn‚Äôt get to try their Lamb Rib & Chips this time, but it‚Äôs definitely on my list for the next visit. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a creative and memorable outing!

Indulged in some creative fun üç∞ From choosing the perfect colors to designing my own masterpiece, it was a truly enjoyable experience. The cozy ambiance and friendly staff made it even more special. Perfect for a family outing or a solo escape
